sentences.sContent: Imagine you’re a cheetah and you see two juicy gazelles grazing in the grass.
sentences.sContent_eng: Imagine you’re a cheetah and you see two juicy gazelles grazing in the grass.
sentences.sCn: 想像你是一个猎豹, 你看见两只味道鲜美的瞪羚正在草地上吃草.

sentences.sContent: Police and wildlife experts were called to the scene, and the injured cheetah was later caught by a pest control worker.
sentences.sContent_eng: Police and wildlife experts were called to the scene, and the injured cheetah was later caught by a pest control worker.
sentences.sCn: 警察和动物救护专家都被召集到了现场，这头受伤的猎豹后来被一名有害物控制人员抓获。

trans.tranOther: a member of the cat family that has long legs and black spots on its fur, and can run extremely fast
